appconfig_properties.name: table_view
appconfig_properties.description: Default layout shown when selecting a table from the object menu.

appconfig_properties.name: table_visible
appconfig_properties.description: Visibility state of a table within the object view.

appconfig_properties.name: column_visible
appconfig_properties.description: Visibility state of a column within the different views.

appconfig_properties.name: display_column_as_currency
appconfig_properties.description: Displays a column as currency type.

appconfig_properties.name: metadata_view
appconfig_properties.description: Default view when showing the metadata information of a table/column
